title: Confronting evils
itunes:title: Confronting evils
itunes:subtitle: Philosopher Susan Neiman considers how Germany and the United States have sought to come to terms with histories of racism and violence, exploring the legacies of the Holocaust and slavery. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
